name: Sopwiths & Pterrordons
description:
*** THIS GAME REQUIRES A COMMODORE 64 EMULATOR ***

Tally Ho! and Pip! Pip!

Looks like we're in a spot of bother, old chap! Somehow we've ended up back in time flying over this deep valley and some right dodgy blighters seem to have it in for us!

Do your best for King and Country and try and get back in time for tea.

Well, chocks away!

----

This game was created on a C64 emulator using the Shoot Em Up Construction Kit.

Control your Sopwith Camel as it flies over the Valley That Time Forgot.

Watch out for spear-throwing Neanderthals, deadly pterrordons, and the hostile environment.

Press Fire at the title screen to begin.

Extra life every 10,000 points.

This ZIP file contains:

* The Original Sopwiths & Pterrordons snapshot disk image (fast loading)

* The Original Sopwiths & Pterrordons disk image (slow loading)

* Sopwiths & Pterrordons SEUCK Redux version (incl. title music by Richard Bayliss) [Not NTSC compatible]

* The S&P title music by Richard Bayliss as a separate SID file

* Development Notes

* The S&P ad I drew for Issue 05 of the Reset C64 fanzine.

*** THIS GAME REQUIRES A COMMODORE 64 EMULATOR ***
